snippet.title: Monospaced Lovers — Release Date Trailer (PC / PS5 / Switch)
snippet.description:
Monospaced Lovers is launching on PC, PS5, and Nintendo Switch on October 31st, 2024!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1164460/Monospaced_Lovers/
PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-ca/concept/10011059
Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/en-ca/store/products/monospaced-lovers-switch/

► ABOUT THE GAME
Monospaced Lovers is an exploration-driven platformer about closeness and distance. Journey through a metafictional, fantasy-filled land and find the truth of your fragile world before it disintegrates.

Monospaced Lovers is a semi-hardcore adventure-platformer that defies the traditional Metroidvania formula. It features exploration-driven quests and puzzles reminiscent of classic Zelda, combined with a visual novel-inspired storyline that's equal parts emotional and philosophical.

The game strives to be original — a novel experience that's more than just a mashup of two existing genres.

► FOLLOW US!
X: https://x.com/scarlet_string  
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/n6GQhXy
